articles.contents:

            Bio
            “I enjoy some of the old and I enjoy the new. And if I
            can find a balance between it, that’s where I find my
            satisfaction.”
            – Anderson
            .Paak - The Dreamer (feat. Talib Kweli & Timan Family
            Choir)
            
            
            Education
            
            
                  
                
              
            Lund UniversityMaster's degree, Economics 2021  Exchange semester 
              
            Stellenbosch UniversityMaster's degree, Economics 2020  Grade: cum laude 
              
            University of Cape TownHonours degree, Economics 2018  Grade: 2:1 
              
            University of Cape TownBachelor's degree, Economics and Economic History 2015-2017  Grade: 2:1 
            
            
            Experience
            Laboratory for the Economics of Africa’s
            Past | Researcher under Prof Johan Fourie|
            January 2020 - July 2021
            FTI Consulting | Junior Economist in Economic
            and Financial Consulting Practice | March 2019 - January
            2020
